kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/auth/login path_url=/auth/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '62', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"username": "email@correto.com", "password": "senha_correta"}'
